00047 #include <basic.h>

00050 #define _NAVIER_STOKES_3D_  "navierstokes3d"
00051 
00052 /* define ndims and nvars for this model */
00053 #undef _MODEL_NDIMS_
00054 #undef _MODEL_NVARS_
00055 
00056 #define _MODEL_NDIMS_ 3
00057 
00058 #define _MODEL_NVARS_ 5
00059 
00060 /* choices for upwinding schemes */
00062 #define _ROE_   "roe"
00063 
00064 #define _RF_    "rf-char"
00065 
00066 #define _LLF_   "llf-char"
00067 
00068 #define _RUSANOV_   "rusanov"
00069 
00070 /* grid directions */
00072 #define _XDIR_ 0
00073 
00074 #define _YDIR_ 1
00075 
00076 #define _ZDIR_ 2
00077 
00084 #define _NavierStokes3DGetFlowVar_(u,rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,p) \
00085   { \
00086     double gamma   = p->gamma, vsq; \
00087     rho = u[0]; \
00088     vx  = u[1] / rho; \
00089     vy  = u[2] / rho; \
00090     vz  = u[3] / rho; \
00091     e   = u[4]; \
00092     vsq  = vx*vx + vy*vy + vz*vz; \
00093     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*vsq) * (gamma-1.0); \
00094   }
00095 
00104 #define _NavierStokes3DSetFlux_(f,rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,dir) \
00105   { \
00106     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00107       f[0] = rho * vx; \
00108       f[1] = rho * vx * vx + P; \
00109       f[2] = rho * vx * vy; \
00110       f[3] = rho * vx * vz; \
00111       f[4] = (e + P) * vx; \
00112     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00113       f[0] = rho * vy; \
00114       f[1] = rho * vy * vx; \
00115       f[2] = rho * vy * vy + P; \
00116       f[3] = rho * vy * vz; \
00117       f[4] = (e + P) * vy; \
00118     } else if (dir == _ZDIR_) { \
00119       f[0] = rho * vz; \
00120       f[1] = rho * vz * vx; \
00121       f[2] = rho * vz * vy; \
00122       f[3] = rho * vz * vz + P; \
00123       f[4] = (e + P) * vz; \
00124     } \
00125   }
00126 
00139 #define _NavierStokes3DSetStiffFlux_(f,rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,dir,gamma) \
00140   { \
00141     double gamma_inv = 1.0/gamma; \
00142     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00143       f[0] = gamma_inv * rho * vx; \
00144       f[1] = gamma_inv * rho * vx * vx + P; \
00145       f[2] = gamma_inv * rho * vx * vy; \
00146       f[3] = gamma_inv * rho * vx * vz; \
00147       f[4] = (e + P) * vx - 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy+vz*vz) * vx; \
00148     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00149       f[0] = gamma_inv * rho * vy; \
00150       f[1] = gamma_inv * rho * vy * vx; \
00151       f[2] = gamma_inv * rho * vy * vy + P; \
00152       f[3] = gamma_inv * rho * vy * vz; \
00153       f[4] = (e + P) * vy - 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy+vz*vz) * vy; \
00154     } else if (dir == _ZDIR_) { \
00155       f[0] = gamma_inv * rho * vz; \
00156       f[1] = gamma_inv * rho * vz * vx; \
00157       f[2] = gamma_inv * rho * vz * vy; \
00158       f[3] = gamma_inv * rho * vz * vz + P; \
00159       f[4] = (e + P) * vz - 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy+vz*vz) * vz; \
00160     } \
00161   }
00162 
00175 #define _NavierStokes3DSetNonStiffFlux_(f,rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,dir,gamma) \
00176   { \
00177     double gamma_inv = 1.0/gamma; \
00178     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00179       f[0] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vx; \
00180       f[1] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vx * vx; \
00181       f[2] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vx * vy; \
00182       f[3] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vx * vz; \
00183       f[4] = 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy+vz*vz) * vx; \
00184     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00185       f[0] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vy; \
00186       f[1] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vy * vx; \
00187       f[2] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vy * vy; \
00188       f[3] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vy * vz; \
00189       f[4] = 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy+vz*vz) * vy; \
00190     } else if (dir == _ZDIR_) { \
00191       f[0] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vz; \
00192       f[1] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vz * vx; \
00193       f[2] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vz * vy; \
00194       f[3] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vz * vz; \
00195       f[4] = 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy+vz*vz) * vz; \
00196     } \
00197   }
00198 
00202 #define _NavierStokes3DRoeAverage_(uavg,uL,uR,p) \
00203   { \
00204     double  rho ,vx, vy, vz, e ,P ,H; \
00205     double  rhoL,vxL,vyL,vzL,eL,PL,HL,cLsq; \
00206     double  rhoR,vxR,vyR,vzR,eR,PR,HR,cRsq; \
00207     double  gamma = p->gamma; \
00208     _NavierStokes3DGetFlowVar_(uL,rhoL,vxL,vyL,vzL,eL,PL,p); \
00209     cLsq = gamma * PL/rhoL; \
00210     HL = 0.5*(vxL*vxL+vyL*vyL+vzL*vzL) + cLsq / (gamma-1.0); \
00211     _NavierStokes3DGetFlowVar_(uR,rhoR,vxR,vyR,vzR,eR,PR,p); \
00212     cRsq = gamma * PR/rhoR; \
00213     HR = 0.5*(vxR*vxR+vyR*vyR+vzR*vzR) + cRsq / (gamma-1.0); \
00214     double tL = sqrt(rhoL); \
00215     double tR = sqrt(rhoR); \
00216     rho = tL * tR; \
00217     vx  = (tL*vxL + tR*vxR) / (tL + tR); \
00218     vy  = (tL*vyL + tR*vyR) / (tL + tR); \
00219     vz  = (tL*vzL + tR*vzR) / (tL + tR); \
00220     H   = (tL*HL  + tR*HR ) / (tL + tR); \
00221     P = (H - 0.5* (vx*vx+vy*vy+vz*vz)) * (rho*(gamma-1.0))/gamma; \
00222     e   = P/(gamma-1.0) + 0.5*rho*(vx*vx+vy*vy+vz*vz); \
00223     uavg[0] = rho; \
00224     uavg[1] = rho*vx; \
00225     uavg[2] = rho*vy; \
00226     uavg[3] = rho*vz; \
00227     uavg[4] = e; \
00228   }
00229 
00241 #define _NavierStokes3DEigenvalues_(u,D,p,dir) \
00242   { \
00243     double          gamma   = p->gamma; \
00244     double          rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,c; \
00245     _NavierStokes3DGetFlowVar_(u,rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,p); \
00246     c    = sqrt(gamma*P/rho); \
00247     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00248       D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vx;     D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00249       D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vx-c; D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00250       D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vx;     D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00251       D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vx;   D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00252       D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vx+c;\
00253     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00254       D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vy;     D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00255       D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vy;   D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00256       D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vy-c;   D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00257       D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vy;   D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00258       D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vy+c;\
00259     } else if (dir == _ZDIR_) { \
00260       D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vz;     D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00261       D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vz;   D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00262       D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vz;     D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00263       D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vz-c; D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00264       D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0;    D[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vz+c;\
00265     } \
00266   }
00267 
00276 #define _NavierStokes3DLeftEigenvectors_(u,L,p,dir) \
00277   { \
00278     double  ga = p->gamma, ga_minus_one=ga-1.0; \
00279     double  rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,a,ek; \
00280     _NavierStokes3DGetFlowVar_(u,rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,p); \
00281     ek = 0.5 * (vx*vx + vy*vy + vz*vz); \
00282       a = sqrt(ga * P / rho); \
00283     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00284         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek + a*vx) / (2*a*a); \
00285         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vx-a) / (2*a*a); \
00286         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vy) / (2*a*a); \
00287         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vz) / (2*a*a); \
00288         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00289         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (a*a - ga_minus_one*ek) / (a*a); \
00290         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = (ga_minus_one*vx) / (a*a); \
00291         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = (ga_minus_one*vy) / (a*a); \
00292         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = (ga_minus_one*vz) / (a*a); \
00293         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = (-ga_minus_one) / (a*a); \
00294         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek - a*vx) / (2*a*a); \
00295         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vx+a) / (2*a*a); \
00296         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vy) / (2*a*a); \
00297         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vz) / (2*a*a); \
00298         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00299         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vy; \
00300         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00301         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = -1.0; \
00302         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00303         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0.0; \
00304         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = -vz; \
00305         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00306         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00307         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 1.0; \
00308         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0.0; \
00309     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) {  \
00310         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek+a*vy) / (2*a*a); \
00311         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((1.0-ga)*vx) / (2*a*a); \
00312         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((1.0-ga)*vy-a) / (2*a*a); \
00313         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ((1.0-ga)*vz) / (2*a*a); \
00314         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00315         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (a*a-ga_minus_one*ek) / (a*a); \
00316         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ga_minus_one*vx / (a*a); \
00317         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ga_minus_one*vy / (a*a); \
00318         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one*vz / (a*a); \
00319         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = (1.0 - ga) / (a*a); \
00320         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek-a*vy) / (2*a*a); \
00321         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((1.0-ga)*vx) / (2*a*a); \
00322         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((1.0-ga)*vy+a) / (2*a*a); \
00323         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ((1.0-ga)*vz) / (2*a*a); \
00324         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00325         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = -vx; \
00326         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 1.0; \
00327         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00328         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00329         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00330         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vz; \
00331         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00332         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00333         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = -1.0; \
00334         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00335     } else if (dir == _ZDIR_) {  \
00336       L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek+a*vz) / (2*a*a); \
00337         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((1.0-ga)*vx) / (2*a*a); \
00338         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((1.0-ga)*vy) / (2*a*a); \
00339         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ((1.0-ga)*vz-a) / (2*a*a); \
00340         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00341         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (a*a-ga_minus_one*ek) / (a*a); \
00342         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ga_minus_one*vx / (a*a); \
00343         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ga_minus_one*vy / (a*a); \
00344         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one*vz / (a*a); \
00345         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = (1.0-ga) / (a*a); \
00346         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek-a*vz) / (2*a*a); \
00347         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((1.0-ga)*vx) / (2*a*a); \
00348         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((1.0-ga)*vy) / (2*a*a); \
00349         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ((1.0-ga)*vz+a) / (2*a*a); \
00350         L[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00351         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vx; \
00352         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = -1.0; \
00353         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00354         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00355         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00356         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = -vy; \
00357         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00358         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 1.0; \
00359         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00360         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 0; \
00361     } \
00362   }
00363 
00372 #define _NavierStokes3DRightEigenvectors_(u,R,p,dir) \
00373   { \
00374     double  ga   = p->gamma, ga_minus_one = ga-1.0; \
00375     double  rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,ek,a,h0; \
00376     _NavierStokes3DGetFlowVar_(u,rho,vx,vy,vz,e,P,p); \
00377     ek   = 0.5 * (vx*vx + vy*vy + vz*vz); \
00378       a    = sqrt(ga * P / rho); \
00379     h0   = a*a / ga_minus_one + ek; \
00380       if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00381         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 1.0; \
00382           R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vx-a; \
00383         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vy; \
00384         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vz; \
00385           R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = h0 - a*vx; \
00386         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00387         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vx; \
00388           R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vy; \
00389         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vz; \
00390         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = ek; \
00391           R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 1.0; \
00392         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vx+a; \
00393         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vy; \
00394           R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vz; \
00395         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = h0 + a*vx; \
00396         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00397           R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00398         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = -1.0; \
00399         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00400           R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = -vy; \
00401         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00402         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00403           R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00404         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 1.0; \
00405         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vz; \
00406       } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00407         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 1.0; \
00408         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vx; \
00409         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vy-a; \
00410           R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vz; \
00411         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = h0 - a*vy; \
00412         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00413         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vx; \
00414         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vy; \
00415           R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vz; \
00416         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = ek; \
00417         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 1.0; \
00418           R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vx; \
00419         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vy+a; \
00420         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vz; \
00421           R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = h0 + a*vy; \
00422         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00423         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 1.0; \
00424           R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00425         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00426         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vx; \
00427         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00428         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00429           R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00430         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = -1.0; \
00431         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = -vz; \
00432     } else if (dir == _ZDIR_) {  \
00433         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 1.0; \
00434         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vx; \
00435         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vy; \
00436         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vz-a; \
00437         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = h0-a*vz; \
00438         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00439         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vx; \
00440         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vy; \
00441         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vz; \
00442         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = ek; \
00443         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = 1.0; \
00444         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vx; \
00445         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vy; \
00446         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = vz+a; \
00447         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+4] = h0+a*vz; \
00448         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00449         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = -1.0; \
00450         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00451         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00452         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = -vx; \
00453         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00454         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00455         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 1.0; \
00456         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00457         R[4*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vy; \
00458     } \
00459   }
00460 
00470 typedef struct navierstokes3d_parameters {
00471   double  gamma;  
00472   double  Re;     
00473   double  Pr;     
00474   double  Minf;   
00475   double  C1,     
00476           C2;     
00477   double  grav_x,                         
00478           grav_y,                         
00479           grav_z;                         
00480   double  rho0;                           
00481   double  p0;                             
00482   double  R;                              
00483   char    upw_choice[_MAX_STRING_SIZE_]; 
00485   double  *grav_field_f, 
00486           *grav_field_g; 
00488   double *fast_jac, 
00489          *solution; 
00491   /* choice of hydrostatic balance                              */
00492   /* 1 -> isothermal                                            */
00493   /* 2 -> constant potential temperature                        */ 
00494   /* 3 -> stratified atmosphere with a Brunt-Vaisala frequency  */
00495   int HB ;
00498   double N_bv; 
00500   char ib_write_surface_data[_MAX_STRING_SIZE_]; 
00503 } NavierStokes3D;
00504 
00505 int    NavierStokes3DInitialize (void*,void*);
00506 int    NavierStokes3DCleanup    (void*);
